Package prkmodel.types.templates

Class DefaultNeuron

java.lang.Object
prkmodel.types.templates.AbstractNervousSystemElement
prkmodel.types.templates.DefaultNeuron
All Implemented Interfaces:
NervousSystemElement, Neuron
Direct Known Subclasses:
RepastNeuron
public class DefaultNeuron extends AbstractNervousSystemElement implements Neuron
Default implementation of the Neuron interface. Represents a neuron in the nervous system with default behaviors and properties.

To implement a subclass:

  • Ensure the constructor properly initializes inherited fields.
  • Override methods to provide specific behavior.
  • Document the purpose of any new methods or overridden methods.
  • Use super to call the superclass method when overriding to extend or modify its behavior.

Since:
2024-07-03
Version:
1.0
Author:
Samuele95

  • Constructor Details

    • DefaultNeuron

      public DefaultNeuron(NeuronNetwork network, ModelElementType type, double x, double y, double z)
      Constructs a new DefaultNeuron with the specified network, type, and position.
      Parameters:
      network - the neuron network this neuron belongs to
      type - the type of the neuron
      x - the X coordinate of the neuron
      y - the Y coordinate of the neuron
      z - the Z coordinate of the neuron
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the network or type is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if the coordinates are invalid
